1.content:
Grace walked down the hallway toward her first floor apartment room, her long dark hair clipped in the back, but it was still messy. She had on a loose fitting dark sweatshirt, jeans and some athletic shoes. Her backpack was swung on her left shoulder as she was getting back from her morning classes.

Grace pulled out her keys and opened the door. Walking into the hallway, she dropped her keys in a bowl and tossed her backpack to the side. She slipped off her shoes and turned into the kitchen. A package was sitting on the table and Grace looked at it to see it had her name on it.

Grace peaked out of the kitchen into the living room. Erin was sitting there in gray sweatpants and a loose pink sweatshirt eating a bowl of cereal. Grace looked around the room.

“Where’s Leah? Doesn’t she have class next hour?”

Erin looked up. “No, not today. We don’t a class until later this afternoon. She’s still in bed.”

Grace thought about that for a moment and shrugged her shoulders. “When did this package arrive?”

Erin continued to eat her cereal and watch TV. “About an hour ago.”

Grace turned back into the kitchen and pulling out some scissors from the drawer opened it up. She pulled out a small device with a keypad and a small window. It looked like a Blackberry. She pulled out the paper and read it.

“Dear Grace. You were always the kindest person in our family. You always called me on my birthday and gave me Christmas presents even though you knew how rich I was. You visited as often as you could when I was sick and for that I am forever grateful. As you are receiving this gift I have unfortunately passed away. This device holds great power and should be used with care. But it also can give you the opportunity to do things you never dreamed possible. Make sure to have fun, but to keep things in perspective.

In short the device is a link to alternative universes. You have the ability to make changes that can either drive you to another universe or make changes to this one. Be aware of the sphere of influence as you can pull others along with you. I know this sounds crazy, but be assured, it is very real. I won’t bore you with origins of the device, but it can do whatever you would like.

Love, Aunt Susan”

Grace could hardly believe what she was looking at. Could this really be true? She could do anything she wanted. Maybe go anywhere as well. But Grace was as practical as her aunt. She would need to be careful. At least that was her initial thought. Looking at the device she found the “On” button and started up the device.

The screen lit up and the word “Calibrating” blinked on the screen. The date and time then came up and a small red light shined briefly. The screen then said, “Welcome Grace Swanson.”

Some type of default screen then came up and Grace noticed the menu included tabs such as Historic Change, Sphere of Influence, and Alternate Universes. It was enough to make her head spin. Sighing, she saw a small Help Icon and moving the pointer toward it, was a bit disappointed when she read the short descriptions.

Historical Change. Make a change that occurred in the past, thus potentially changing the present. The historical change can also be set to zero so the effects occur in the present.

Sphere of Influence. Making changes either historically or making changes that drive to alternate universes or affecting alternate universes can include the user of the device or others. Memories will be affected accordingly or as defined. In addition, attitudes and emotions can be changed.

Alternate Universes. Review the basic designs of alternate universes and find a different you. You can then insert yourself there, explore the differences and make changes.

There were a few warnings attached at the end, but no real instructions. Apparently the only way she was going to see if it actually worked was to try it out.

Picking up the device, she walked into the living room. Leah stumbled into the same room from the other direction where the bedrooms were and plopped down on the couch next to Erin. She had on shorts and a t-shirt and her long blonde hair was a mess. She wasn’t wearing a bra and her large breasts pushed out against the material of her shirt. Grace sighed at the sight. Were those things filled with anti gravity material? Leah looked up at Grace.

“What’s going on?”

Grace paused. Should she tell her roommates about the device or should she just head into room to try it out alone? Grace thought about how much she’s like to show it to Josh as well. On the other hand, if it was some type of alternate universe device, perhaps she should go for a walk and see what could happen with it.

Smiling back at Leah, Grace decided to:
1.title: The Device is Delivered

choices: Stick to the normal results
Ensure a high end fitness body
Go for the bodybuilding babe
Become a Supergirl with massive muscles
Change her roommates as well
11.content:
Grace smiled at Leah. “Oh nothing much. I just got back from class. My aunt left me her old Blackberry. I was going to check it out in my room for a while.”

Leah yawned and nodded her head. Erin looked up and smiled.

“No problem, we need to change anyway. Maybe we can get some lunch somewhere soon.”

Grace smiled and shook her head at the fact that Erin was currently eating. “Sure, that sounds like fun.”

With that Grace walked into her room and shut the door behind her. She sat down at her desk and began to think about what she could do. To test it out it would be best to try something simple to start. That would at least seem prudent. So without really knowing what would happen, Grace punched the Historical button and she was a bit surprised when the screen came up with nothing more than “Enter Description of Desired Change”

Grace sat back and smiled. She wasn’t prepared for that. Looking down at her blue socks, she looked back at the screen. Keep it simple to start.

She typed in “I put on white socks this morning instead of the blue socks.” She shrugged her shoulders and hit Enter.

The screen went blank for a moment and came back up. “Related changes to this universe negligible. Hit Enter again to make change.”

Grace looked down at her socks again, looked at the screen and with another shrug, hit Enter. A quick bright light caused her to shut her eyes. Blinking slowly she looked around and everything looked the same. Almost not wanting to look at her feet, she slowly tilted her head down. Her socks were white.

“No Way!”

She sat back in her chair, her head spinning. So many opportunities, so many things to change. Looking at the poster on her wall of an 80’s Era Rachel McLish, Grace looked at her own arm. She had signed up at the gym but had only gone a few times. Gaining any muscle would be a challenge. Smiling, Grace looked at the device again.

“If this thing can change my socks, I wonder if it can change me.”

She rubbed her chin and thinking for a moment, hit Historical Again on the device and started typing. “I started working out with weights a year ago. I worked out at least 5 days a week and grew stronger and more muscular.”

Grace paused as she knew she wasn’t being very specific, figuring this would test the device. She also knew that she could cancel out if it gave an undesirable response. So when she hit enter, this time there was more of a delay. The device came back with an expected follow up.

“Define stronger and more muscular. Note that the device can take your body type and create a normal progression based upon your DNA. However, more dramatic changes are possible, but with a related historical change and the possibility of a shift or creation of an alternate universe.”

Grace smiled. So that’s how this thing works. You can make adjustments to keep things in perspective. She suspected that’s how her Aunt did so well in life, but now she had to wonder why she didn’t do more, or why she didn’t figure out a way to cheat death. Scrunching her small nose as she normally did when she was thinking through a tough problem; Grace took her time before she began to type again. As she typed, Grace knew she was about to start an adventure and hopefully have a little fun.

So with a smile on her face, Grace decided to:
11.title: Head to her room to try the device

choices: No changes yet. Grace goes with the flow.
Change Erin's past so she started working out with Grace a year ago.
Change Leah's memories so she is interested in female muscle too.
113.content:
Grace started typing then stopped. Her original intent was to just see what kind of body she would have naturally acquired over the past year of exercise, but then she began to wonder how far she could push things. Why settle for merely fit when she could push some limits? After all, wouldn't it be beneficial to see what changes resulted from a rather large change? It was purely scientific, Grace told herself. If she didn't like the results or the changes were too drastic she could always return things. Couldn't she?

Grace thought for a few moments and then decided to define what "stronger and more muscular" meant:

“I started working out with weights a year ago. I worked out at least 5 days a week. From that time to now I added 110 pounds of muscle and increased my strength by ten times."

Grace read over the last sentence a few times then shivered with excitement. She knew that doubling her body weight was pretty extreme. She wasn't sure, but she was fairly confident that would make her bigger than any other woman out there. This clearly went well beyond her original goal of enhancing her body to Rachel McLish proportions, but the chance to out grow every other woman alive was too good to pass up. Even more exciting than her impending size was her strength. As painfully thin as she was now she could manage to curl 25 pounds in each arm, but she was about to be able to handle 250 pounds instead. She'd been impressed at her ability to bench press 70 pounds for several reps, soon she'd be pressing 700 pounds.

Without another moments hesitation Grace pressed enter on her new device. It processed for a bit longer than it had with her change of socks, but after a few seconds the screen said, "“Related changes to this universe minimal. Press Enter again to make change. Press See More for details of changes." Grace quickly pressed Enter. A moment later her vision was once again filled with blinding white light.

As her eyes readjusted and her vision cleared Grace felt energized. She could actually feel her new power flowing through her body; she couldn't remember the last time she'd felt so good. Then she looked down and felt even better.

Her chest was now a 7 inch thick wall of pure muscle and blocked her view of the rest of her new body. Fortunately Grace found that she now had a full body mirror attached to her wall which gave her the full view. She was enormous. Just as she had guessed 220 pounds at her height of 5' 9" made her bigger than any other woman out there. She wore a pink t-shirt that was tight ebough across her wide shoulders and pumped pecs that the outline of her sports bra was clearly visible. The bottom of the shirt had been torn off so that her deeply cut abs were displayed. Grace marveled over these running her fingers through the deep grooves in the six solid bricks on her tummy then over the piano key bumps that were her obliques. Next Grace raised one of her arms and flexed her mighty bicep. Her arm swelled to such incredible size that Grace couldn't believe it was her own. For a second she wondered how big it was but then she knew.

"21 and three quarters inches." She said aloud. "I just measured them five days ago." But that wasn't possible, she'd only just grown into this body moments ago. However she could clearly remember all the hard work she had put in over the last year. She remembered the laughs and snickers at the gym when she first arrived and started working with the weights. She remembered how the laughter stopped after a few months when her body began swelling rapidly and her strength shot through the roof. She could remember having to buy new clothes frequently and the joy of exploding right out of old ones.

"This is so weird. It's like the last year of my life was all some movie that I just watched. Except it's real." Grace ran her hand over the giant peak and gave the plump muscle a hard squeeze. There was no give at all.

Grace continued taking stock of her new physique with her legs. She wore black tights that ran from her waist to just above her ankle, but the material was so tight that every groove, every bulge and curve, every vein was clearly visible. She slid her right foot forward and flexed her thigh. The tights began to stretch so much that they became less opaque.

"33 inches," Grace told herself. "With 20 inch calves."

Grace was overjoyed. She looked incredible. She felt invincible. And this was only the beginning. She admired the magical device that made her fantasies a reality for a moment before hiding it in her backpack. "Now, let's go see if the girls still want to have lunch. I want to take this body for a test drive and see how it feels."

Grace, without even thinking about it, picked up a protein shake that was sitting on the bookshelf next to her door and took a long sip. She didn't think its appearance strange because she could vividly remember making it just after arriving home from her morning classes.

Grace returned to the living room where she found Leah sitting exactly where she'd been before. Grace sat in the easy chair across from Leah and half expected her friend to freak out at the sight of Grace's giant muscles. Instead Leah simply glanced at Grace and returned to watching TV.

"How can you drink that stuff?" Leah asked pointing to the protein shake in Grace's hand.

Grace shrugged. "You get used to it. Some flavors really aren't bad at all." She took a deep gulp. "Besides, I love the thickness. I can almost feel the weight of it flowing right into my muscles making them even bigger." Grace giggled at the thought.

Leah rolled her eyes. "How can you guys be so proud of those ugly muscles. Blech!! You look like guys."

Grace was about to ask what Leah meant by "you guys" when Erin emerged from her room in a new outfit ready to head out and find lunch. Grace had to make a serious effort to keep her jaw from hitting the floor. Erin had always been fit from her high school days on the volleyball team, but now she was downright buff.

Erin wore a tiny tank top that left her meaty shoulders and developed arms bare. But it was to Erin's legs that Grace's eyes were drawn. Erin wore denim shorts that showed off her dynamite thighs and gorgeous calves. Each of Erin's legs were coated with thick slabs of sinew that pumped with each step she took. She didn't have the cut or definition that Grace and, nor the size, but there was obvious power in Erin's legs which looked like they'd been transposed from a gymnast.

"So, who's hungry," the adorable redhead with the killer physique asked.

"Didn't you just finish eating?" Leah asked.

"Yeah, I had a snack. Now I'm really hungry. Gotta feed a growing body." Erin flexed her 15 inch biceps which popped like baseballs. "Right, Gracie?"

Grace smiled and nodded. She was thinking back over the past year and remembering (for the first time) how impressed Erin had been with Grace's growing muscles. About six months ago Erin had joined her in her near daily work outs and now Grace was witnessing the fruits of her labor. "You know it. Growing muscles need fuel. I was just telling Leah that myself."

Leah shook her head. "Ug!! You two!! I'll never understand your muscle fetish."

The trio gathered their things and left their apartment. As they walked to the diner on the corner they frequented Grace began to think about her next move. A part of her just wanted to enjoy the day and see where her bodacious body took her. Another part of her wanted to see what would happen if Erin had started working out with her right at the start a year ago. How much bigger would she be? Would having a friend with her have made her own growth even more extreme? Lastly Grace wanted to see if she could use the "sphere of influence" function to figure out why Leah was so against female muscle. Maybe she could even change her opinion and get her body pumped up as well.
113.title: Grace the Bodacious Bulging Bodybuilding Babe

1132.content:
At the diner, Grace noticed another side effect of the device’s work; without even ordering the waitress brought Grace her new “usual”: a giant 10 egg white omelette, with a similar 6 egg version for Erin. As she wolfed down her breakfast, Grace decided to see how the rest of the day went before making any other changes.

...

Going to the gym just felt weird. She’d only been there a couple times, but everything felt so routine. When she stepped out of the locker room, she found Erin already waiting for her at the weight benches, waving her over.

She counted up the plates on the bar in her head and reeled: 400 pounds.

Even though she feigned confidence to Erin as she laid down on the bench, inside, Grace was terrified. She’d never done a real bench press before, just once or twice with a machine. And even at her new size this was nearly twice her weight.

Grace took a deep breath and let instinct take over. She placed her hands precisely where they were supposed to go, and with a small grunt pushed the bar up off the rack and lowered the massive weight onto her chest.

And Grace pushed it back up! And again. And again! Grace grinned as the 400 pound barbell hardly felt heavy at all. So this was what it felt like to be strong. After 12 perfect reps, Grace racked the weight and sat up on the bench.

“Do you need another warmup set, or are you ready for the real weight?” Erin asked.

A cocky grin broke across Grace's face.

"Let's do this!"

Grace pushed out several more progressively heavier sets, each one a bit harder as weight and fatigue took its toll. She started to falter a bit at 675 pounds.

Grace could feel the burning in her pecs as she struggled through the last couple reps. Grace racked the weight and sat up on the bench, panting and dripping with sweat, Grace was amazed at her fantastic strength, but in the back of her head, she felt... disappointed?

"Take an extra minute to rest. I'll add another 10 pounds," Erin said, handing Grace her water bottle.

Grace turned to look at her workout partner in shock. Erin put her hand on Grace's pumped shoulder and smiled.

"Don’t worry, I’ll be here to spot you."

It took four more sets before Erin let her stop, adding a little more weight each time. By then, Grace had grit out 3 reps at 725 pounds, a new personal best.

...

Grace laid in her now somewhat undersized bed that night, still marvelling at the weight and heft of her pecs, feeling them bob up and down with minimal effort. It was too bad that she seemed to have lost what little amount of breasts she had, but maybe that was something the device could fix.

The device.

Grace pulled out the small object and reflected on all it had given her. And how much had also come from Erin. Grace typed in a new command:

Erin started working out with me from the beginning.

Like before the device said the changes to the universe were minimal. Grace hit enter on the device before drifting off to sleep.

...

As the early morning sunlight filtered in through the blinds, Grace’s thoughts returned to her one by one as she slowly regained awareness on the world around. She noticed how heavy her muscled body felt.

She noticed that she had apparently went to sleep in the nude, which was something she never did.

She noticed that her normally shoulder-length hair was hanging down in her face, obscuring her vision.

She noticed that her bed felt bigger and softer than it should’ve.

And she noticed that she wasn’t the only person in her bed.

“Morning, lover.”

A hand pushed aside Grace’s stray bangs as Erin leaned in for a passionate morning kiss.

Grace tried to move, but her arms were tangled up in the plush duvet that now covered her bed. She wasn’t into girls and neither was Erin. What the hell is going on?!

As her roommate's tongue pushed past her teeth Grace felt an odd familiarity, like this was normal. She felt her resistance soften as she found herself kissing back.

The now queen-sized bed creaked as Erin shifted around until she was straddling Grace’s hips.

Grace’s eyes widened in shock. Erin was huge! At least as big as Grace was yesterday, if not a little bigger.

“Oooh! I love seeing you first thing in the morning. Your abs are just a little bit tighter then.”

Grace couldn’t even see her abs over her massive pecs, but she could feel Erin’s fingers run over the hard ridges on her stomach. Erin rocked her hips. Smooth, freshly-shaven skin tugged at Grace’s labia, sending tingles of pleasure up her spine.

Grace arched her back in response, taking in the new body of her new lover. With the additional 6 months of training from the device Erin was easily as big as Grace. Erin noticed Grace’s glances and gave her bulging arms a playful flex.

“22 inches as of yesterday,” Erin said before dropping her head with a coy smile.

“But no matter how hard I work, I can never seem to catch up to you.”

And just like before, new recollections of Grace’s measurements popped into her head. The one that came to the forefront was her arms: “26 inches cold, 27 pumped.” Was that true, she thought. Was she bigger too?

Suddenly, scores of new memories from the past year flooded into Grace’s mind. Their first day at the gym. Trying to figure out the machines. The soreness of those first few weeks. How they celebrated when their abs first started to show.

Intense, late night workouts. Gorging on protein bars and shakes. Urging Erin on through grueling bench presses. Sitting on each other’s backs while grinding out calf raises. The conversations between sets.

The awkward first kiss. Eventually taking it farther and farther over the weeks until they’d made it official and started sleeping in the same bed about four months ago.

Grace was snapped out of her spontaneous recollection by the alarm on Erin’s phone.

“Oh, dang. We’re gonna be late.“

Grace looked to the clock. It’s 6 am. They didn’t have class for four hours.

“C’mon. I know how long it takes to work your legs. If we don’t hurry, you won’t get a good pump before we have to go to class,” Erin said, nudging, Grace out of bed. “Now, hurry up and get changed.”

Erin slipped on a robe, picked out some clothes for Grace and tossed them on the bed before heading to the kitchen. Grace finally escaped the mass of sheets, bedspreads and fluffy pillows that had confined her. She could instantly tell she was heavier as she stepped over a full length mirror that was now in her their bedroom.

Grace gasped in amazement. She was definitely bigger than yesterday. Additional pounds and inches of muscle bulged out in all direction, making her look like she was carved out of granite.

The next thing Grace noticed was that she now had a light tan. She could clearly remember arguing with Erin about the dangers of tanning. And how Erin had won her over by telling her how great it would make her abs look. And now that Grace could see them, she had to admit, Erin was right. As Grace shifted her hips, her deeply etched 8 pack and thick obliques looked amazing, especially offset by her meaty glutes and 38” thighs.

Grace’s hair was also at least 3 inches longer than she normally wore it. Before she could even question it, the answer bubbled up into Grace’s mind; “Erin likes it longer.”

Grace wriggled into the tiny bike shorts and sports bra Erin had laid out for her. For some reason the barely adequate clothing felt completely normal. Grace pulled her lengthened locks into a ponytail, marveling at the cantaloupe-sized bicep that twitched to life with the slightest flex and her massive wing-like lats that pushed her arms away from her torso. She was truly gigantic.

Grace slipped into the bathroom and stepped on the scale to see the true measure of Erin’s assistance.

260. Erin’s help had netted her another forty pounds of muscle.

Grace stepped out of the bedroom and into the kitchen. Without saying a word, Erin handed her a huge protein shake and stole a kiss on her way to get changed herself. As she took a pull on the thick chocolate shake, Grace finally noticed Leah sitting at the kitchen table, nursing a cup of coffee and looking generally haggard.

“Um... morning. uh... late night?”

Leah just sat a glowered at her for several seconds before speaking.

“You know, you two can have all the freaky muscle sex you want, but can you at least try to keep it down during the week? I bet I’m not the only in the neighborhood you’re waking up every night.”

Before Grace could respond, Erin stepped out of the bedroom wearing an identical outfit as Grace. Grace gulped down the rest of her shake a headed out the door with the gym bag Erin had already packed for her.

Grace stepped outside and received another shock. Her car was gone!

Before she could fully panic, Grace again got that feeling that this was normal. She took a deep breath and thought, searching for a new memory to explain this. And there it was. Grace and Erin had both sold their cars a couple months ago in order to cover supplements and other expenses like the fancy new bed.

Grace turned around to see Erin’s smiling face as walked up wheeling a pair of heavy duty mountain bikes.

1133.content:
Grace was taking in the stares and whispers of those around them as they walked into the diner. Not all of them were positive sounding, but there was a group of guys who didn’t seem to mind. The girls were all good looking, with Leah still the prettiest. And while she and Erin were dressed in tight workout outfits, Leah had on dark blue shorts and a form fitting pink top that showcased a body to shame any Sports Illustrated swimsuit model. And for someone who proclaimed not to like the muscles of her roommates, Leah had firm, strong looking legs, a killer behind and a shapely upper body. Leah wasn’t visibly hard with a normal amount of fat for her shapely figure, but it was difficult not to jealous of someone who could look like that without having to work for it.

As they sat down at a table, Grace sat across from Erin, while Leah sat down between them. Erin smiled. “I think the guys find our muscles intriguing Leah. You’d be surprised how many men in the gym find us sexy.”

Leah shook her head. “Well maybe a few I suppose. But besides Josh, are the guys really chasing after you Grace?”

Grace blushed. It was amazing that the memories crowded her head as two lives seemed to fight for space. The comment jarred her thoughts and yes, Josh and her were now an item. She would need to make sure to stop by his apartment when they got back. Grace smiled sheepishly.

“I don’t know. When I work out I’m kind of focused.”

Erin chuckled. “Well I know that guys in the gym like what they see from me.”

Erin lifted up her right arm next to Leah and flexed her bicep into a hard baseball sized mound of muscle, split cleanly and peaked nicely. It was bigger than most bodybuilding women her size. Leah grunted and pushed Erin’s arm away.

“Well those are the guys in the gym. I prefer to have a bigger fan base.”

Erin shook her head. “We all how you like to impress the men, but don’t you want to slow down a bit and stick with someone a little longer?”

Leah frowned for a moment, giving Erin’s comment some thought. She then smiled again and giggled. “Nope!”

Erin smiled and shook her head. “Well you know how Grace and I worry. We don’t like it when you get hurt.”

As Erin and Leah talked, Grace was focusing on fiddling with her gift. Grace had thought about Leah and typed in “A year ago Leah started working out with me and really liked the results. Boys liked her new physique so she kept going.”

Grace hit enter and looked up at Leah. Grace agreed with Erin that they worried about Leah being a bit boy crazy. If guys gave her complements about an outfit, she’d go get two more just like it. And while she wasn’t overly promiscuous, Leah had no problem jumping into bed with different men. The problem was she’d buy into the guy’s sweet talk and then once they got what they wanted she’d get upset with them when their true nature came out. But Leah seemed to bounce back each time and maintained a positive attitude, even though Grace and Erin concerned about how long that could last.

What Grace hadn’t known was that Leah had been into gymnastics when she was young and her body quickly grew hard and very strong, adding dense muscles at an astounding rate. Instead of being impressed, the other girls made fun of her and those at school mocked her. So Leah quit gymnastics soon after and never worked out again. As Leah grew older her body filled in with killer curves and enough natural muscle to give her a little hard body and to keep her boobs high on a strong chest, even though Leah didn’t do anything extra to help.

The device came back with “Related changes to this universe increasing beyond nominal. Press Enter again to make change. Press See More for details of changes.”

133.content:
“Ever since the age of 15,” Josh typed. “Grace, Leah and Erin have been lifting heavy weights. As a result, all three have physiques that would make any bodybuilder jealous, male or female.” He thought for a moment before continuing. “All three have a newly discovered gene that, when the right amount of stress is applied to the body, the muscle fibers grow faster and overall strength levels continue to climb.”

Taking a deep breath and imagining Grace—or any other woman, for that matter—the size of the morphs he looked at online, Josh hit Enter. The phone pinged and he glanced down at the message.

“Historical Change?” the phone asked. Reading the description the device gave him, Josh pressed “No.”

A second message popped up on the phone next. "Sphere of influence?” Josh glanced up at the pretty 18 year old, still looking nervously at him, and then typed: “Only I (Jake Robinson) and Grace Swanson will realize things are different.” Pressing Enter again and choosing “No” on “Alternate Universes” without even reading the text, he next heard Grace scream out in fright, as every muscle in her body began to swell rapidly.

“Oh my God! What’s happening to me?” She yelled, as her biceps were already the size of tennis balls and her leg muscles were beginning to strain her shorts. Rushing over to the full length mirror in the room, Grace watched her body continue to transform before her eyes, finally calming down when she realized what was happening.

“Did…Did you do this, Josh?” she asked, as her clothes grew bigger to fit her larger physique.

Now it was his turn to be nervous. Not knowing if she was angry with him, Josh chose his words carefully. “Yeah, I did. Well, the phone did, I guess. I just typed it in, you know? Are you mad? Should I cancel it or reverse it or something?”

“No, I kind of like this,” Grace told him, flexing one of her enormous arms. “Jesus, I just keep growing, don’t I? How big did you make me?”

“I didn’t specify. I just typed, ‘A physique that would make any bodybuilder jealous, male or female.’”

“Did you?” Grace replied, grinning at her reflection, realizing she now had the body she always dreamed of having. And then some. She was bigger than anyone on the football team and felt like she could out lift them all easily.

Her transformation stopped eventually and Grace turned this way and that in the mirror, admiring her new physique, before turning back to Josh. “So, how do you like the new me?”

For Josh, it was a fantasy come to life. A woman as big as any morph he had seen online, standing in front of him. A woman he knew had a huge crush on him.

“I…I love it,” he told her, feeling his member press against his pants.

Just then, there was a knock at the door and Leah walked in, wearing a tank top and possessing a physique as impressive as Grace’s.

info.brief_description: Grace receives a device that can change about anything, but with warnings.
info.description:
Grace, an 18 year old junior college freshman has just received a surprise from her great aunt’s estate. The device doesn’t have many instructions and warned about the power afforded. Her great aunt felt that Grace was the only one she could trust with something this dangerous.

Grace is living in a small apartment with two friends from high school, Erin and Leah, and had made friends with two boys across the hall, Josh and Max, that went to the same junior college.

Grace was kind and curious with normal interests, but secretly into some of the geekier pursuits such as video games and science fiction books and movies, which was one of the reasons she was friends with Josh. But she also had a fascination for female fitness and some of the classic bodybuilding woman she saw on line. Grace wasn’t any kind of athlete, but had recently joined a gym to see if she couldn’t get into better shape.

What she had yet to realize was that the device was a doorway to multiple universes that could spawn from changes made through the device. History could be altered to modify their current universe; a person (or group of people) could journey to other universes; or specific changes could alter events and results in unknown ways.

The initial characters include

Grace, 18 years old
5 foot 9, 110 pounds, dark hair, rather thin.
Dreams of being more muscular and stronger

Erin, 18 years old
5 foot 7, 125 pounds, cute with red hair and freckles.
Volleyball setter in high school, slight athletic build

Leah, 19 years old
5 foot 4, 120 pounds, blonde hair, very pretty with a curvy body
Lively and bubbly, the social organizer, but needs help from Grace with school work

Josh, 19 years old
5 foot 10, 150 pounds, average build
Pines after Grace, very smart but needs to save to go to a larger university

Max, 18 years
6 feet 1 inch tall, 170 pounds and in good shape
Former basketball player, met Josh at college

I would prefer if no main characters would die or that you do not end the story unless it really must end.

There are a few ground rules tied to my own likes:

- The bent is female muscle growth, so no negative female muscle comments or story additions

- Giant 50 foot women are not what I would like. Some height increases are fine, but keep the characters 8 feet or under.

- Feel free to bring other characters into the story, but they need to be connected to the main characters somehow.

- No one sentence additions unless you follow up with one of the selections. The story will be fun if entries keep things moving forward.

- No anthro (furries) please

- I reserve the right to make changes to entries

Other than that, have at it.
